response.original_title: Masters of Poker: Phil Hellmuth's Million Dollar Poker System
response.overview: 9 time WORLD CHAMPIOPION of POKER, Phil Hellmuth reveals the never before seen secrets that have earned him MILLIONS of dollars playing Poker! Phil was the youngest person to ever win the World Series Of Poker and is known in the sports world as The Greatest Poker Player of all time! Now for the first time, you can learn (from the master) what it takes to become a world champion poker player!
response.title: Masters of Poker: Phil Hellmuth's Million Dollar Poker System
